summary: This module implements TensorFlow backend primitives for sparse graph computations in DGL. It provides wrappers around custom TensorFlow ops to perform CSR-based matrix multiplication, segment reductions, edge softmax, scatter-add, and related gradient calculations, enabling efficient handling of sparse adjacency structures for graph neural networks.
